    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:DD303_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>DD303_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Attention</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufmerksamkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Attention</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atenção</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attenzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσοχή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Atención</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">What does ‘attention’ mean to you? This unit will help you to examine how we ‘pay attention’. How do we manage to single out sounds and images that require attention and how easy is it to distract someone and why?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Science and Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Attention</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Brain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Cognition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">distraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Hearing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Images</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Information</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Perception</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Psychology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Sounds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Stroop_effect</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Vision</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was?attention? Mittel zu Ihnen? Diese
Maßeinheit hilft Ihnen, zu überprüfen wie wir?pay Aufmerksamkeit?. 
Wie handhaben wir, Töne auszusortieren und Bilder, die 
Aufmerksamkeit und wie einfache benötigen, ist es, zum jemand 
abzulenken und warum?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que ?attention ? moyen à vous ? 
Cette unité vous aidera à examiner comment nous une attention 
?pay ?. Comment parvenons-nous à choisir des bruits et les 
images qui exigent l'attention et combien faciles est-elles lui pour 
distraire quelqu'un et pourquoi ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que ?attention? meio a você? Esta 
unidade ajudar-lhe-á examinar como nós atenção?pay?. Como 
nós controlamos escolhir para fora dos sons e as imagens que requerem
atenção e como fácil são ele para distract alguém e por que?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa?attention? media a voi? 
Questa unità li aiuterà ad esaminare come noi attenzione?pay?.
Come riusciamo a scegliere i suoni e le immagini che richiedono 
l'attenzione e quanto facili è esso per distract qualcuno e perchè?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι ?attention; σημάνετε σε σας; Αυτή η 
μονάδα θα σας βοηθήσει για να εξετάσει πώς εμείς προσοχή 
?pay;. Πώς κατορθώνουμε να επιλέξουμε τους ήχους και τις 
εικόνες που απαιτούν την προσοχή και πόσο εύκολος είναι αυτός 
για να αποσπάσει κάποιο και γιατί;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué ?attention? ¿medio a usted? 
Esta unidad le ayudará a examinar cómo nosotros 
atención?pay?. ¿Cómo manejamos seleccionar sonidos y las 
imágenes que requieren la atención y cómo fáciles es él para 
distraer a alguien y por qué?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
